title: Secret Service Agents Called Hillary Clinton’s Airplane ‘Broomstick One’?
subtitle: An Internet joke circulating since the early 2000s holds that U.S. Secret Service agents and military personnel refer to Hillary Clinton's aircraft as "Broomstick One."
author: David Emery
vclaim: Secret Service and military personnel have used the designation "Broomstick One" for aircraft carrying Hillary Clinton.
